languages.text: "Его судьба заключалась в служении Крудараху — духу нашего {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}мира-корабля{/g}, что пребывает в живых {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детях Азуриана{/g}. Такая же судьба предначертана и тебе, Изгой Ирлиэт — если только ты не собираешься вновь преступить наши законы".

traits.locale_text: "Его судьба заключалась в служении Крудараху — духу нашего мира-корабля, что пребывает в живых детях Асурьян. Такая же судьба предначертана и тебе, Изгой Ирлиэт — если только ты не собираешься вновь преступить наши законы".

languages.text: "His fate was to serve Crudarach — the spirit of our {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} that keeps the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} alive. Your destiny is to do the same, Yrliet the Outcast — as long as you aren't planning to transgress our laws again."
languages.original_text: "Его судьба заключалась в служении Крудараху — духу нашего {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}мира-корабля{/g}, что пребывает в живых {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детях Азуриана{/g}. Такая же судьба предначертана и тебе, Изгой Ирлиэт — если только ты не собираешься вновь преступить наши законы".

traits.locale_text: "His fate was to serve Crudarach — the spirit of our craftworld that keeps the Asuryani alive. Your destiny is to do the same, Yrliet the Outcast — as long as you aren't planning to transgress our laws again."

"His fate was to serve Crudarach — the spirit of our craftworld that keeps the Asuryani alive. Your destiny is to do the same, Yrliet the Outcast — as long as you aren't planning to transgress our laws again."

"His fate was to serve Crudarach — the spirit of our craftworld that keeps the Asuryani alive. Your destiny is to do the same, Yrliet the Outcast — as long as you aren't planning to transgress our laws again."

"His fate was to serve Crudarach — the spirit of our {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} that keeps the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} alive. Your destiny is to do the same, Yrliet the Outcast — as long as you aren't planning to transgress our laws again."

languages.text: “他的命运就是为克鲁达拉赫服务。我们的{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟世界{/g}的神魂会让我们{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}方舟灵族{/g}生生不息。你的命运是做同样的事情，流浪者伊莉耶特。希望你别打算再次违背我们的律法。”
languages.original_text: "His fate was to serve Crudarach — the spirit of our {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} that keeps the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} alive. Your destiny is to do the same, Yrliet the Outcast — as long as you aren't planning to transgress our laws again."

traits.locale_text: “他的命运就是为克鲁达拉赫服务。我们的{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟世界{/g}的神魂会让我们{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}方舟灵族{/g}生生不息。你的命运是做同样的事情，流浪者伊莉耶特。希望你别打算再次违背我们的律法。”

languages.text: 「彼奴の運命はクルダラに尽くすためにあった—我らが{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟{/g}の精霊が、{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリヤーニ{/g}を生かしている。お前の運命も同じだ、追放者ユリエット—我らの規則を再び破ろうと企てない限りはな」
languages.original_text: "His fate was to serve Crudarach — the spirit of our {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} that keeps the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} alive. Your destiny is to do the same, Yrliet the Outcast — as long as you aren't planning to transgress our laws again."

traits.locale_text: 「彼奴の運命はクルダラに尽くすためにあった—我らが{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟{/g}の精霊が、{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリヤーニ{/g}を生かしている。お前の運命も同じだ、追放者ユリエット—我らの規則を再び破ろうと企てない限りはな」

languages.text: "Sein Schicksal war, Crudarach zu dienen – dem Geist unseres {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Weltenschiffs{/g}, das die {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} am Leben hält. Und das ist auch Euer Schicksal, Yrliet, die Ausgestoßene – solange Ihr nicht vorhabt, unsere Gesetze erneut zu übertreten."
languages.original_text: "His fate was to serve Crudarach — the spirit of our {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} that keeps the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} alive. Your destiny is to do the same, Yrliet the Outcast — as long as you aren't planning to transgress our laws again."

traits.locale_text: "Sein Schicksal war, Crudarach zu dienen – dem Geist unseres {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Weltenschiffs{/g}, das die {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} am Leben hält. Und das ist auch Euer Schicksal, Yrliet, die Ausgestoßene – solange Ihr nicht vorhabt, unsere Gesetze erneut zu übertreten."

languages.text: « Son destin était de servir Crudarach, l'esprit de notre {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}vaisseau-monde{/g} qui permet aux {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryanis{/g} de survivre. Il en va de même pour vous, Yrliet l'Errante, tant que vous ne comptez pas enfreindre nos lois à nouveau. »
languages.original_text: "His fate was to serve Crudarach — the spirit of our {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} that keeps the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} alive. Your destiny is to do the same, Yrliet the Outcast — as long as you aren't planning to transgress our laws again."

traits.locale_text: « Son destin était de servir Crudarach, l'esprit de notre {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}vaisseau-monde{/g} qui permet aux {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryanis{/g} de survivre. Il en va de même pour vous, Yrliet l'Errante, tant que vous ne comptez pas enfreindre nos lois à nouveau. »

languages.text: «Su destino era servir a Crudarach, el espíritu de nuestro {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}mundo astronave{/g} que mantiene vivo a los {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}asuryani{/g}. Tu destino será el mismo, proscrita Yrliet, siempre que no tengas intención de volver a transgredir nuestras leyes».
languages.original_text: "His fate was to serve Crudarach — the spirit of our {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} that keeps the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} alive. Your destiny is to do the same, Yrliet the Outcast — as long as you aren't planning to transgress our laws again."

traits.locale_text: «Su destino era servir a Crudarach, el espíritu de nuestro {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}mundo astronave{/g} que mantiene vivo a los {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}asuryani{/g}. Tu destino será el mismo, proscrita Yrliet, siempre que no tengas intención de volver a transgredir nuestras leyes».

languages.text: "Onun kaderinde, Crudarach'a ve de {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryanileri{/g} hayatta tutan {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}gemidünyanın{/g} ruhuna hizmet etmek vardı. Senin kaderine de aynısı yazılmış Yurtsuz Yrliet... Yeniden yasalarımızı çiğneme planın yoksa tabii."
languages.original_text: "His fate was to serve Crudarach — the spirit of our {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} that keeps the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} alive. Your destiny is to do the same, Yrliet the Outcast — as long as you aren't planning to transgress our laws again."

traits.locale_text: "Onun kaderinde, Crudarach'a ve de {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g}'yi hayatta tutan {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}gemidünya{/g}nın ruhuna hizmet etmek vardı. Senin kaderine de aynısı yazılmış Yurtsuz Yrliet... Yeniden yasalarımızı çiğneme planın yoksa tabii."
